trans-unit.source: Contains a cache of XML Schema definition language (XSD) and XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schemas.
trans-unit.target: 包含 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 和 XML-Data Reduced (XDR) 結構描述的快取。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection" /> class class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection" /> 類別已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> instead.
trans-unit.target: 請改用 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Schemas are loaded using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Add%2A> method, at which time the schema is associated with a namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: 結構描述已載入使用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Add%2A>方法，這時結構描述會在命名空間統一資源識別元 (URI) 與相關聯。

trans-unit.source: For XML Schemas, this will typically be the `targetNamespace` property of the schema.
trans-unit.target: 對於 XML 結構描述，這通常會是`targetNamespace`屬性結構描述。

trans-unit.source: Although this class stores both XML Schemas and XDR schemas, any method and property that takes or returns an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> applies to XML Schemas only.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會儲存 XML 結構描述和 XDR 結構描述，雖然任何方法和屬性，會使用或傳回<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>僅適用於 XML 結構描述。

trans-unit.source: This version of the product supports the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Schema recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1 and http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的產品支援位於全球資訊網協會 (W3C) XML 結構描述建議事項http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1和http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2。

trans-unit.source: An XML Schema must reference the W3C Schema namespace `http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema` in its schema element.
trans-unit.target: XML 結構描述必須參考 W3C 結構描述命名空間`http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema`其結構描述項目中。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Add%2A> method for an example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Add%2A>範例的方法。

trans-unit.source: `XmlSchemaCollection` can be used by <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader> for efficient data validation.
trans-unit.target: `XmlSchemaCollection` 可供<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>進行有效率的資料驗證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別已經過時 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中，已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example validates an XML document using the `XmlSchemaCollection`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會驗證 XML 文件使用`XmlSchemaCollection`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="XmlSchemaCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="XmlSchemaCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="XmlSchemaCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="XmlSchemaCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlNameTable" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see langword="XmlNameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="XmlSchemaCollection" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see langword="XmlSchemaCollection" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlNameTable" /> is used when loading schemas.
trans-unit.target: 載入結構描述時會使用 <see langword="XmlNameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the given schema into the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的結構描述加入結構描述集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlSchema" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的 <see langword="XmlSchema" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 加入至集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlSchema" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="XmlSchema" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The `targetNamespace` attribute is used to identify this schema.
trans-unit.target: `targetNamespace`屬性用來識別此結構描述。

trans-unit.source: If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果要加入的結構描述包含其他命名空間的參考 (透過`include`和`import`項目)，應用程式的信任層級會決定這些命名空間的解決方式。

trans-unit.source: (In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> was always used).
trans-unit.target: (在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，預設值<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>一定會使用)。

trans-unit.source: `Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources.
trans-unit.target: `Fully trusted code:` 預設值`XmlUrlResolver`沒有使用者認證用來解析外部資源。

trans-unit.source: The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only.
trans-unit.target: 為這些命名空間的結構描述已載入僅供驗證。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，他們就無法存取使用任何集合方法或屬性。

trans-unit.source: If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些外部資源會在需要驗證的網路資源，請使用多載採用<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>做為其中一個引數，並指定`XmlResolver`具有必要認證。

trans-unit.source: `Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: `Semi-trusted code:` 不會解析外部參考。

trans-unit.source: If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`使用正在存取<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，`Add`方法會使用`XmlResolver`所指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlSchemaCollection" /> you want to add to this collection.
trans-unit.target: 您要加入至這個集合的 <see langword="XmlSchemaCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds all the namespaces defined in the given collection (including their associated schemas) to this collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的集合中定義的所有命名空間 (包含其相關的結構描述) 加入這個集合。

trans-unit.source: If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果要加入的結構描述包含其他命名空間的參考 (透過`include`和`import`項目或`x-schema`屬性)，應用程式的信任層級會決定這些命名空間的解決方式。

trans-unit.source: (In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> was always used).
trans-unit.target: (在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，預設值<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>一定會使用)。

trans-unit.source: `Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources.
trans-unit.target: `Fully trusted code:` 預設值`XmlUrlResolver`沒有使用者認證用來解析外部資源。

trans-unit.source: The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only.
trans-unit.target: 為這些命名空間的結構描述已載入僅供驗證。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，他們就無法存取使用任何集合方法或屬性。

trans-unit.source: If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些外部資源會在需要驗證的網路資源，請使用多載採用<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>做為其中一個引數，並指定`XmlResolver`具有必要認證。

trans-unit.source: `Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: `Semi-trusted code:` 不會解析外部參考。

trans-unit.source: If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`使用正在存取<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，`Add`方法會使用`XmlResolver`所指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI associated with the schema.
trans-unit.target: 與結構描述關聯的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: For XML Schemas, this will typically be the <see langword="targetNamespace" />.
trans-unit.target: 對於 XML 結構描述而言，這通常會是 <see langword="targetNamespace" />。

trans-unit.source: The URL that specifies the schema to load.
trans-unit.target: 指定要載入之結構描述的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Adds the schema located by the given URL into the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 URL 找到的結構描述加入結構描述集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> added to the schema collection; <see langword="null" /> if the schema being added is an XDR schema or if there are compilation errors in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 加入結構描述集合的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" />，如果加入的結構描述是 XDR 結構描述，或者結構描述中有編譯錯誤，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If `ns` has already been associated with another schema in the collection, the schema being added replaces the original schema in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ns`已關聯與集合中的另一個結構描述加入結構描述取代原本的結構描述集合中。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the following C# code, authors.xsd is removed from the collection and names.xsd is added.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列 C# 程式碼 authors.xsd 從集合中移除和 names.xsd 加入。

trans-unit.source: If `ns` is `null` and the schema being added is an XML Schema, the `Add` method uses the `targetNamespace` defined in the XML Schema to identify the schema in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ns`是`null`新增結構描述為 XML 結構描述，`Add`方法會使用`targetNamespace`來識別集合中的結構描述的 XML 結構描述定義。

trans-unit.source: If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果要加入的結構描述包含其他命名空間的參考 (透過`include`和`import`項目或`x-schema`屬性)，應用程式的信任層級會決定這些命名空間的解決方式。

trans-unit.source: (In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> was always used).
trans-unit.target: (在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，預設值<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>一定會使用)。

trans-unit.source: `Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources.
trans-unit.target: `Fully trusted code:` 預設值`XmlUrlResolver`沒有使用者認證用來解析外部資源。

trans-unit.source: The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only.
trans-unit.target: 為這些命名空間的結構描述已載入僅供驗證。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，他們就無法存取使用任何集合方法或屬性。

trans-unit.source: If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些外部資源會在需要驗證的網路資源，請使用多載採用<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>做為其中一個引數，並指定`XmlResolver`具有必要認證。

trans-unit.source: `Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: `Semi-trusted code:` 不會解析外部參考。

trans-unit.source: If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`使用正在存取<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，`Add`方法會使用`XmlResolver`所指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example validates three XML files using schemas stored in the `XmlSchemaCollection`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會驗證使用儲存在結構描述的三個 XML 檔案`XmlSchemaCollection`。

trans-unit.source: The sample uses the following five input files:
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用下列五個輸入的檔案：

trans-unit.source: The schema is not a valid schema.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述不是有效的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI associated with the schema.
trans-unit.target: 與結構描述關聯的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: For XML Schemas, this will typically be the <see langword="targetNamespace" />.
trans-unit.target: 對於 XML 結構描述而言，這通常會是 <see langword="targetNamespace" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> containing the schema to add.
trans-unit.target: 包含要加入之結構描述的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the schema contained in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 加入包含在 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 中的結構描述至結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> added to the schema collection; <see langword="null" /> if the schema being added is an XDR schema or if there are compilation errors in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 加入結構描述集合的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" />，如果加入的結構描述是 XDR 結構描述，或者結構描述中有編譯錯誤，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If `ns` has already been associated with another schema in the collection, the schema being added replaces the original schema in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ns`已關聯與集合中的另一個結構描述加入結構描述取代原本的結構描述集合中。

trans-unit.source: If `ns` is `null` and the schema being added is an XML Schema, the `Add` method uses the `targetNamespace` defined in the XML Schema to identify the schema in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ns`是`null`新增結構描述為 XML 結構描述，`Add`方法會使用`targetNamespace`來識別集合中的結構描述的 XML 結構描述定義。

trans-unit.source: If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果要加入的結構描述包含其他命名空間的參考 (透過`include`和`import`項目或`x-schema`屬性)，應用程式的信任層級會決定這些命名空間的解決方式。

trans-unit.source: (In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> was always used).
trans-unit.target: (在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，預設值<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>一定會使用)。

trans-unit.source: `Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources.
trans-unit.target: `Fully trusted code:` 預設值`XmlUrlResolver`沒有使用者認證用來解析外部資源。

trans-unit.source: The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only.
trans-unit.target: 為這些命名空間的結構描述已載入僅供驗證。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，他們就無法存取使用任何集合方法或屬性。

trans-unit.source: If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些外部資源會在需要驗證的網路資源，請使用多載採用<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>做為其中一個引數，並指定`XmlResolver`具有必要認證。

trans-unit.source: `Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: `Semi-trusted code:` 不會解析外部參考。

trans-unit.source: If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`使用正在存取<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，`Add`方法會使用`XmlResolver`所指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The schema is not a valid schema.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述不是有效的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlSchema" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的 <see langword="XmlSchema" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> used to resolve namespaces referenced in <see langword="include" /> and <see langword="import" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />，用來解析 <see langword="include" /> 和 <see langword="import" /> 項目中參考的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, external references are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個值是 <see langword="null" />，就不會解析外部參考。

trans-unit.source: Adds the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 加入至集合中。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> is used to resolve any external references.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />，用來解析任何的外部參考。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlSchema" /> added to the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至結構描述集合中的 <see langword="XmlSchema" />。

trans-unit.source: The `targetNamespace` attribute is used to identify this schema.
trans-unit.target: `targetNamespace`屬性用來識別此結構描述。

trans-unit.source: If the schema contains `include` and `import` elements that reference other namespaces, the schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only.
trans-unit.target: 如果結構描述包含`include`和`import`項目會參考其他命名空間的結構描述，這些命名空間已載入僅供驗證。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，他們就無法存取使用任何集合方法或屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds a schema to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將結構描述加入集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> is passed to the `Add` method which sets the necessary credentials required to access any external resources referenced in the schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>傳遞至`Add`設定所需的認證，存取任何結構描述中所參考的外部資源所需的方法。

trans-unit.source: The schema is not a valid schema.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述不是有效的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI associated with the schema.
trans-unit.target: 與結構描述關聯的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: For XML Schemas, this will typically be the <see langword="targetNamespace" />.
trans-unit.target: 對於 XML 結構描述而言，這通常會是 <see langword="targetNamespace" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> containing the schema to add.
trans-unit.target: 包含要加入之結構描述的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> used to resolve namespaces referenced in <see langword="include" /> and <see langword="import" /> elements or <see langword="x-schema" /> attribute (XDR schemas).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />，用來解析在 <see langword="include" /> 和 <see langword="import" /> 項目或 <see langword="x-schema" /> 屬性 (XDR 結構描述) 中參考的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, external references are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個值是 <see langword="null" />，就不會解析外部參考。

trans-unit.source: Adds the schema contained in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 加入包含在 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 中的結構描述至結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> is used to resolve any external resources.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />，用來解析任何的外部資源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> added to the schema collection; <see langword="null" /> if the schema being added is an XDR schema or if there are compilation errors in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 加入結構描述集合的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" />，如果加入的結構描述是 XDR 結構描述，或者結構描述中有編譯錯誤，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If `ns` has already been associated with another schema in the collection, the schema being added replaces the original schema in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ns`已關聯與集合中的另一個結構描述加入結構描述取代原本的結構描述集合中。

trans-unit.source: If `ns` is `null` and the schema being added is an XML Schema, the `Add` method uses the `targetNamespace` attribute defined in the XML Schema to identify the schema in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ns`是`null`新增結構描述為 XML 結構描述，`Add`方法會使用`targetNamespace`屬性來識別集合中的結構描述的 XML 結構描述定義。

trans-unit.source: If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only.
trans-unit.target: 如果要加入的結構描述包含其他命名空間的參考 (透過`include`和`import`項目或`x-schema`屬性)，為這些命名空間的結構描述已載入僅供驗證。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，他們就無法存取使用任何集合方法或屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The schema is not a valid schema.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述不是有效的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a schema with the specified namespace is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示具有指定命名空間的結構描述是否在集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI associated with the schema.
trans-unit.target: 與結構描述關聯的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: For XML Schemas, this will typically be the target namespace.
trans-unit.target: 對於 XML 結構描述而言，這通常會是目標命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a schema with the specified namespace is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示具有指定命名空間的結構描述是否在集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a schema with the specified namespace is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有指定命名空間的結構描述是在集合中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks to see if a schema is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查結構描述是否在集合中。

trans-unit.source: If it is, it displays the schema.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，它會顯示結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlSchema" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="XmlSchema" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see langword="targetNamespace" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 的 <see langword="targetNamespace" /> 是否在集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is a schema in the collection with the same <see langword="targetNamespace" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合中有具有相同 <see langword="true" /> 的結構描述，則為 <see langword="targetNamespace" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the objects to.
trans-unit.target: 將物件複製到其中的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index in <c>array</c> where copying will begin.
trans-unit.target: 在 <c>array</c> 中開始複製的索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the <see langword="XmlSchema" /> objects from this collection into the given array starting at the given index.
trans-unit.target: 將這個集合中所有的 <see langword="XmlSchema" /> 物件複製到從指定索引開始的指定陣列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of namespaces defined in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個集合中定義的命名空間數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of namespaces defined in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合中定義的命名空間數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: Provides support for the "for each" style iteration over the collection of schemas.
trans-unit.target: 提供以「各自獨立」方式逐一查看結構描述集合的支援。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for iterating over all schemas in the current collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式，用來逐一查看目前集合中的所有結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays each of the XML Schemas in the schema collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示每個 XML 結構描述的結構描述集合中。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI associated with the schema you want to return.
trans-unit.target: 與您要傳回的結構描述相關聯的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: This will typically be the <see langword="targetNamespace" /> of the schema.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是結構描述的 <see langword="targetNamespace" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> associated with the given namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定的命名空間 URI 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlSchema" /> associated with the namespace URI; <see langword="null" /> if there is no loaded schema associated with the given namespace or if the namespace is associated with an XDR schema.
trans-unit.target: 與命名空間 URI 相關聯的 <see langword="XmlSchema" />，如果載入的結構描述與指定的命名空間無關聯，或者命名空間與 XDR 結構描述相關聯，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks to see if a schema is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查結構描述是否在集合中。

trans-unit.source: If it is, it displays the schema.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，它會顯示結構描述。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default <see langword="XmlNameTable" /> used by the <see langword="XmlSchemaCollection" /> when loading new schemas.
trans-unit.target: 取得載入新結構描述時 <see langword="XmlNameTable" /> 使用的預設 <see langword="XmlSchemaCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="XmlNameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="XmlNameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the objects to.
trans-unit.target: 將物件複製到其中的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index in <c>array</c> where copying will begin.
trans-unit.target: 在 <c>array</c> 中開始複製的索引。

trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.CopyTo(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema[],System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the count of the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合中的項目計數。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.System#Collections#ICollection#IsSynchronized" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.System#Collections#ICollection#IsSynchronized" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the collection is synchronized, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合已同步處理則傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.System#Collections#ICollection#SyncRoot" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.System#Collections#ICollection#SyncRoot" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" /> object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可用來同步存取集合的 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.GetEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.GetEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Sets an event handler for receiving information about the XDR and XML schema validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 設定事件處理常式，接收關於 XDR 和 XML 結構描述驗證錯誤的資訊。

trans-unit.source: These events occur when the schemas are added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述加入至集合時，就會發生這些事件。

trans-unit.source: If an event handler is not provided, an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> is thrown on any validation errors where the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs.Severity%2A> is `XmlSeverityType.Error`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供的事件處理常式，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException>任何驗證錯誤時擲回其中<xref:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs.Severity%2A>是`XmlSeverityType.Error`。

trans-unit.source: To specify an event handler, define a callback function and add it to the `ValidationEventHandler`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定事件處理常式，定義的回呼函式，並將它加入`ValidationEventHandler`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set an event handler to handle invalid XML Schemas.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定事件處理常式來處理無效的 XML 結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The preceding example uses the file `invalid.xsd` as input.
trans-unit.target: 上述範例會使用檔案`invalid.xsd`做為輸入。
